Purchase Invoice Line Item Sales Tax
Standard (faster, may have gaps, per system)

CustomMethodType.description: Formula for calculating depreciation for fixed asset

CustomMethod.description: Straight Line depreciatiion algorithm for fixed asset((purchaseCost - salvageCost)/expectedLifeInYears)
Double decline depreciatiion algorithm for fixed asset((NetBookValue - salvageCost)*2/remainingLifeInYears)
